00016 ServiceRepository::~ServiceRepository()

00020 
00021 bool ServiceRepository::AddListener(ServiceRepositoryListener* Listener, ServiceFilter * Filter, bool NotifyOnlyNewEvents /* = false */ )
00022 {
00023     if ( Listener != (ServiceRepositoryListener*)NULL )
00024     {
00025         SmartLocker SL_RepoListeners(RepoListeners);
00026 
00027         // Add listener and start its browse
00028         RepoListeners.AddTail(Listener);
00029 
00030         if ( Filter != (ServiceFilter *)NULL )
00031         {
00032             Listener->SetFilter( Filter );
00033         }
00034 
00035         SL_RepoListeners.Unlock();
00036 
00037         Listener->StartBrowse( NotifyOnlyNewEvents );
00038 
00039         return true;
00040     }
00041 
00042     return false;
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool ServiceRepository::AddListener(ServiceRepositoryListener* Listener, bool NotifyOnlyNewEvents /* = false */ )
00046 {
00047     return AddListener( Listener, (ServiceFilter*)NULL, NotifyOnlyNewEvents );
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool ServiceRepository::RemoveListener(ServiceRepositoryListener* Listener, bool NotifyAsIfExistingServicesDisappear /* = false */ )
00051 {
00052     bool Found;
00053 
00054     if ( Listener == (ServiceRepositoryListener*)NULL )
00055     {
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058 
00059     SmartLocker SL_RepoListeners(RepoListeners);
00060 
00061     Found = false;
00062     for( RepoListeners.First(); RepoListeners.NotAtEnd(); RepoListeners.Next() )
00063     {
00064         if ( RepoListeners.GetCurrent() == Listener )
00065         {
00066             Found = true;
00067             RepoListeners.RemoveCurrent();
00068             break;
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072     SL_RepoListeners.Unlock();
00073 
00074     if ( Found == true )
00075     {
00076         // Stop browse
00077         Listener->StopBrowse( NotifyAsIfExistingServicesDisappear );
00078 
00079         // Remove its listener
00080         Listener->UnsetFilter();
00081         return true;
00082     }
00083 
00084     return false;
00085 }

00087 ServiceProxyList * ServiceRepository::GetAllServices()
00088 {
00089     ServiceProxyList * pList = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxyList;
00090     if ( pList == (ServiceProxyList *)NULL )
00091     {
00092         return (ServiceProxyList *)NULL;
00093     }
00094 
00095     AutoDelete<DnsSdServicesList> ServList = DnsSdProxy::GetCurrentServicesList();
00096     if ( ServList != (DnsSdServicesList*)NULL )
00097     {
00098         DnsSdService * pServ;
00099         ServiceProxy * pSP;
00100         for( ServList->First(); ServList->NotAtEnd(); ServList->Next() )
00101         {
00102             pServ = ServList->GetCurrent();
00103             if ( pServ == (DnsSdService *)NULL )
00104             {
00105                 continue;
00106             }
00107 
00108             pSP = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxy( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), pServ->HostName, pServ->Port, (ServiceProperties&)pServ->Properties) ;
00109             if ( pSP == (ServiceProxy *)NULL )
00110             {
00111                 continue;
00112             }
00113 
00114             // Add it to the proxy list
00115             pList->AddTail( pSP );
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     return pList;
00120 }

00122 // To be compliant with java API
00123 void ServiceRepository::Stop()
00124 {
00125     ServiceRepositoryListener * pListener;
00126 
00127     // Remove all entry from my list and remove them from the DnsSdProxy
00128     SmartLocker SL_RepoListeners(RepoListeners);
00129 
00130     // While we have ServiceRepositoryListeners
00131     while( RepoListeners.GetNumberOfElements() > 0 )
00132     {
00133         pListener = RepoListeners.ExtractFirst();
00134         if ( pListener != (ServiceRepositoryListener *)NULL )
00135         {
00136             pListener->StopBrowse();
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140 }
